node.address: Calle Espiritu Santo 29/209. Getsemani, Frente a la Iglesia San Roque , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
With new and refreshed spaces, the Hostel has 10 rooms, shared and private, all of them renovated, modern and comfortable. An impeccable customer service and a laid-back ambiance await people wanting to live and unforgettable experience. All our rooms have private bathroom and air conditioning.

The Hostel possesses a well equipped kitchen, utensils, full kitchenware, fridge, suitcase room, lockers and free WI-FI.

We also provide all the tourism information you need for the most attractive destinations around the city. We can organise your trip to Santa Marta and Tayrona park.

Come and enjoy our common spaces: living-room, bar, music and more!

La Costeña Hostel is located in the Getsemani neighbourhood on the Espiritu Santo Street (CRA 10 C ) 29/209.

Taking the Media Luna Street (Main Street of the neighbourhood) following the Castillo San Felipe direction, you will reach the San Roque Church that faces the Hostel.

description.description: In an old colonial house, former site of The El Expectador newspaper, in the heart of Getsemani neighbourhood, La Costena Hostel welcomes people from all around the world. The Hostel is located near all main sightseeing places of our beautiful city: Cartagena de Indias. The Hostel is situated in the center of a lively and vibrant neighbourhood near all bars and restaurants.
